scripts.pub:
git add . 
 git commit -m update 
 git push 
 npm publish

update.0.1.21: tweak allowing noise functions inherited from object tolerated against queries
update.0.1.20: removed logging of QueryString; updated commit log; altered test2.js with cleaner code.
update.0.1.18: Added support for initialize with mysql connector along with http request handler
update.0.1.17: added regular o-tree methods, added license
update.0.1.16: no need to check for empty space in query
update.0.1.10: fixed a logic bug in getFieldString
update.0.1.5: 0.1.5 fixed a small formatting issue when multiple properties are queried in get
update.0.1.1: added quoting to query allowing spaces
update.0.1.0: major release, all routes tested and working
